text: pumiyil urntu tiriyakkutiyavaiyum, tan iru irakkaikalal (akayattil) parakkak kutiyavaiyum unkalaip ponra (uyirulla) pataippukale (camutayankale) tavira verillai. (Ivarril) onraiyume (nam pativup) puttakattil (lavhul mahhpulil) kurippitatu nam vittuvitavillai. Pinnar, (oru nalil) ivaiyum tankal iraivanitam kontu varappatum
